name: staff_training_journey_evaluation
description: Test the staff training and API development journey

steps.expected: Staff training system should load with advanced inventory features and business optimization guides

steps.action: Fill login form with username 'admin' and password 'admin123'
steps.expected: Should authenticate admin user and grant access to training system
Should display advanced inventory features and business optimization training materials
API development should be accessible for third-party integrations and custom business process automation

Business optimization tools should load with performance metrics and efficiency tracking
Should display performance metrics and efficiency tracking for business optimization
Scalability features should load with enterprise-grade architecture and growth planning
Should display enterprise-grade architecture and growth planning capabilities
Integration system should load with third-party connectors and custom business process automation
